channel.title: Feedback
channel.description: Troubleshooting and interesting ideas go here.

item.title: Can't load a saved SA session
item.author: invalid@example.com (Giftmischer)
item.dc:creator: Giftmischer
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

you've made a great mod, but there's something which disturbs me:
I can't load a saved SA session.
Even when I try this, I come back to the current game session or, when I haven't start a new game session, I come back to the intro screen.

What's wrong?
Is there something special I have to configure?


Greetings,

Giftmischer

item.title: DON"T GIVE UP!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (C_Boogy)
item.dc:creator: C_Boogy
item.content:encoded:
I played your beta, and I love it.

Please don't stop working on it. I love the concept, the layout (everything...)

So, incase you missed my first two lines: continue.


ps: i've been following your mod for a little over a year now, and i think you've done a good job.

item.title: Readme?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Madharia)
item.dc:creator: Madharia
item.content:encoded: Where can I find the mac readme for SA? It's not included in the download file, and I can't install it without it or your help.

item.title: a new mod
item.author: invalid@example.com (migwell)
item.dc:creator: migwell
item.content:encoded:
Just blew out my second PNY GeForce 4 card (covered under a lifetime warranty at least) so I am back playing the older games on my back up GF2 card and found Silent Assassin.

So far I have played some single player but cannot save a game, which means restarting from the beginning every time... And I played a bot map with the same problem although I don't know if these games are saveable, though it plays like single player. Maybe my problems result from my not being able to use the...

a new mod
